:rocket: :boom: Major refactoring

:rocket: Release: 0.16.0 - Change ReVoman back to being stateless - RequestInfo for preHooks - Changed StepReport - Support for JsonAdapter or Factory from Request or Response config - JSON utils to aid writing custom adapters - Kick config changes
Convert ConnectInputRepresentationWithGraph to interface
Add test in github workflow
:rocket: Release 0.17.0 - Use Arrow Either internally as Vavr Either doesn't work well with Sealed classes - Enhance StepReport -- Add index numbers -- Status with emoji - Bug fixes with Validation

:bug: Release 0.17.1 - Bug fix to replace regex on original pm request after pre-hooks
-- Status with emoji - Bug fixes with Validation

:bug: Release 0.17.2 - Bug fix to avoid marshalling if content is not JSON
-- Status with emoji - Bug fixes with Validation

:bug: Release 0.17.2 - Bug fix to avoid marshalling if content is not JSON
-- Status with emoji - Bug fixes with Validation
Signed-off-by: Gopal S Akshintala <gopala.akshintala@salesforce.com>

:rocket: Release 0.18.0 - Bearer Token key gets flown from the parent - Remove bearerTokenKey config param - Test script js runs both for success or failure response - Bug fix: Unmarshall response only for JSON responses
Signed-off-by: Gopal S Akshintala <gopala.akshintala@salesforce.com>

:bug: Release 0.18.1 - Bug fix in Deep flatten items - Optimize config DS for request and response
Signed-off-by: Gopal S Akshintala <gopala.akshintala@salesforce.com>
